_sText:
- Changes v3s -
===============
* Added Radar
* Added Weapon (Use with Controllable E) Note: Do not use it when you have a flag
* Added protecion blocks 30max (Use with E)
* New Zone of the cave
* Change system flag use (charli)
* Delete: Plugin AutoRespawn (use sourcemod)
* Other changes etc ...

The objective of the map is to capture 4 flags (area) to finish the game the losing team will be removed the weapons and teleport in a cage the winning team may kill them all. 

> To the 9min of the game will be removed from the AutoRespawn to finish the game

Each new round there will be various weapons a total 12 weapons to a maximum 300HP regeneration and speed more gravity. 

Note: SourceMod (sm respawn @dead) 3s - 10s random time
